name: Sysmon Process Hollowing Detection
description: Detects when a memory process image does not match the disk image, indicative of process hollowing.
false_positives: There are no known false positives at this time
query: (winlog.event_data.Type:/[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee]\ [Ii][Ss]\ [Rr][Ee][Pp][Ll][Aa][Cc][Ee][Dd]/ AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\).*/) AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.Type:Image\ is\ replaced AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR *\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)*) AND process.executable:(*\\chrome.exe OR *\\opera.exe OR *\\firefox.exe OR *\\MicrosoftEdge.exe))))`
